mainContent.heading: What is the FAQs Section?
paragraphs: The FAQs Section allows you to display frequently asked questions in a clear, expandable layout that improves customer understanding and reduces support requests.
It helps organize important information such as product details, policies, shipping, or services into easy-to-read dropdowns that enhance the browsing experience.
This section is ideal for product pages, homepages, or dedicated help pages where customers need quick answers before making a purchase.
